text:
OS: WinNT Workstation 4.0 
CPU: Intel Celeron 566 mhz
RAM: 128 MB RAM

I'm running Tomcat 4.1.10 and HTTP Server 2.0.39 through mod_jk. Tomcat 4.0.4 
needs 18-20 Mb for run, but Tomcat 4.1.10 needs 48 - 50 mb. I'm talking about 
RAM. Is this a bug or I will have to buy more RAM?

- buy more ram
- ask tomcat users for more info
creator: funkman@joedog.org
